channel.title: Softlayer_network_monitor on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_monitor on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor Service Datatype Description Methods getIpAddressesByHardware Returns an ArrayObject of subnet ip address objects for a hardware getIpAddressesByVirtualGuest Returns an ArrayObject of subnet ip address objects for a guest resource.

item.title: getIpAddressesByHardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor::getIpAddressesByHardware Overview This will return an arrayObject of objects containing the ipaddresses. Using an string parameter you can send a partial ipaddress to search within a given ipaddress. You can also set the max limit as well using the setting the resultLimit. Parameters Name Type Description hardware SoftLayer_Hardware The hardware object. partialIpAddress string A partial ipaddress is sent. Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers resultLimit Return Values SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress[]

item.title: getIpAddressesByVirtualGuest
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor::getIpAddressesByVirtualGuest Overview This will return an arrayObject of objects containing the ipaddresses. Using an string parameter you can send a partial ipaddress to search within a given ipaddress. You can also set the max limit as well using the setting the resultLimit. Parameters Name Type Description guest SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest The virtual guest object. partialIpAddress string A partial ipaddress is sent. Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers resultLimit Return Values SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress[]
